content: For release on delivery   12:30 p.m. EST    November 17, 2016           The “Gig” Economy:    Implications of the Growth of Contingent Work      Remarks by    Lael Brainard    Member    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    “Evolution of Work,” a convening cosponsored by   the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System,    the Federal Reserve Bank of New York, and the Freelancers Union    New York, New York          November 17, 2016
